header_text: You are going to see your family for a holiday. You enjoy seeing your family, but recently it has been getting more difficult to get out to see them. As you imagine the amount of time you will spend with your loved ones over the next few years, you believe your family will remain close.

elements.Text: As your family spends less time together, you think...
